Thrown around some more.
1232221.content: Though she tried her hardest to hanf on tightly, she was tossed around to the point that she could no longer hand on. Her arms released the toe, and she felt herself tumble around as Lillith took a step. Suddenly there was a massive amount of pressure as the wrinkled arch of her sole came down on her. She thought she would be killed, but there wasn't quite enough pressure to squish her. Another step through her forward this time, and Alins found herself wedged tightly between Lilliths toes. The smell was even worse here, and nearly made her gag.
1232221.title: Alina lets go

choices: Rosie slips down to the floor and races for Lilith and Alina for help.
Rosie stays put, hoping that someone will see her before sitting.
Rosie climbs up onto the end table and hangs out around the food.
Rosie wanders cautiously over to the front door to meet Sarah.
Rosie has another idea...
14.content:
Sitting by the window, Rosie was waiting for some more of her friends to show up. Not that she didn't like a lot of the people at Alina's birthday party, she was moreso expecting the others long ago. Sarah especially was supposed to be her ride home this evening.

She was sitting on the armrest of an easy chair, drinking punch and relaxing quietly. As she brought the punch glass up to her black lips again however, she felt funny. Rosie paused and placed the cup down on the table next to the chair. Sliding down onto the chair itself she began to feel numb.

Smiling to herself, Rosie considered the fact that they may have spiked the punch. Which wasn't a big deal until she realized that the seat around her was actually getting bigger. The room itself was expanding outward, like the walls were growing away from her. Rosie's hands gripped the arm rests and she found they too had become larger.

Looking around nervously, Rosie found herself unable to call out as she realized she was getting smaller and smaller. She was actually shrinking! Her feet couldn't reach the ground anymore and her black sandals clattered to the floor as they became too larger for her. Desperately turning to her friends, Lilith and Alina were way too busy entertaining the other guests.

Outside she was sure she heard Sarah's car pulling up. By the time she got inside, Rosie would be probably be far too small to even notice anyway! As she panicked more ideas raced through her mind. She could side off the chair before she got too small and wander over to her friends. At such a small size though it seemed intimidating to be around Lilith's feet. After all, she'd probably enjoy teasing Rosie with them. Even Alina would probably join in and play around with their now shrunken friend.

If she didn't do that soon she'd be stuck on this chair. The worst from that would be if someone else sat down. She'd be smushed under their butt! Rosie didn't like the idea of that, but if someone looked down before they sat, she'd be fine. After all, it was a party. No one wanted to sit in anything she was sure. Maybe that was a way to get someone's attention.

Lastly there was the small end table next to the chair. It had a bowl of chips or something on it and if she could get near that, surely she could get someone's attention. If nothing else she could even get into the food and get a lift up to her friends faces.

The doorknob turned and she considered racing for that too. After all, if it was Sarah then she'd be fine. She was a good friend and hopefully wouldn't hurt a shrunken person. Rosie wondered how reconizable she was at this size. That's when she considered her clothes. No sure enough her actual outfit had shrunk along with her. Perplexed she peered down towards the end of the cushion she was on, wondering why this shrinking hadn't affected her sandals.

With little time, Rosie made the first big decision of her new shrunken size.
14.title: Rosie

choices: Climb up onto Lilith's TUCKS sneaker and get her attention.
Climb up onto Alina's sandal and get her attention.
Look for another party goer or hide for awhile till the girls sit down.
141.content:
Her friends obviously wouldn't hurt her. Sure they may joke around with her but otherwise Rosie didn't think she had anything to fear. Though she was wondering who had made her shrink. Lilith and Alina might joke around with her a bit but that was all. Sarah could just assume Rosie was a bug and squish her on sight if she wasn't in on this shrinking joke.

Rosie thought it was all safe. She'd run over to her friends, they'd have a good laugh cause they were only pretending to not pay attention as she shrunk, and they'd help her. Of course they would! That's what friends do.

So she slipped down off the chair, just in time as she became too small to properly climb back up on it without some serious effort, and began making her way across the wide open floor. In the distance she saw the huge sandals of the two goth sisters. It was intimidating as she approached them, their legs stretching up so high into the air above her.

She slowed down as she approached. It dawned on her that the giant girls above her may not know she was there. One wrong step and she'd be mushed under those rubbery sandal soles. Just another smear on the floor along with dip and snack food crumbs that had been dropped.

That's when Rosie froze and watched Alina pivot her giant sandal up on her heel. Her mighty toes bent upward and rose into the air, consealing her beautiful black nail polish. She stopped admiring when suddenly the huge foot slammed down on a chip which crumbled and was crushed to pieces with just that one step. There wasn't even any pressure behind it and Alina was happily wiggling her toes along to the music and leaning on her other foot. It had just crunched. Just like Rosie would if she was unfortunate enough to wander under there.

Taking a deep breath she continued forward. It seemed safe to climb up on one of the sisters sandals and stay there. After all, she couldn't end up under those sandals then. "Just under their feet," was Rosie's continued conclusion of that decision. She imagined sliding down under the soft skin of one of the giant girls and being smushed into the grimy rubbery insole of their sandal. Shaking her head she still continued on. It wasn't safe down here either and she had to do something!

Time was running out. Sarah would be at the door soon and odds are one of the sisters would go to greet or help her. Running forward Rosie decided to...
141.title: Rosie slips down to the floor.

choices: Climb Lilith's body.
Run around Lilith and reach her from behind.
Try to get to a "sensitive" area to surely get Lilith's attention
1411.content:
Of everyone here, Lilith had the prettiest feet. She took good care of them and spent a great deal of time at that. They were always neatly polished and super clean. Which is why Rosie decided that would be her best option. She was however very aware that she could easily be crushed to death by an unsuspecting Lilith. She would have to be very very careful in how she approaches this.
First things first, she had to get inside Lilith's sneakers, and fast. She quickly climbed up and ran towards the opening, just as she heard the sound of a doorbell.
"I'll get it!" Lilith's extremely loud voice almost punctured Rosie's ears. She wasted no time and jumped inside Lilith's shoes. She ran towards the front of the show and seconds later Lilith's gigantic foot went into the sneaker's. Rosie barely managed not to get crushed as she made it to the end of the shoe, Lilith's toes moved in around her. She was between the big toe and the index toe.
Rosie let go a sigh of relief that she is still alive. She looked around her, she was hardly as tall as Lilith's big toe. These are some really nice feet.. Rosie's state of relaxation did not last very long. She heard the sound of the Lilith sealing her tucks. Her toes around her hugged the shoe in preparation to start walking. First everything tilted around and Rosie found herself falling towards the front of the shoe as Lilith lifted her heel. Then as her shoe flew Rosie was thrown back between Lilith's giant toes. This is going to be a bumpy a ride. Rosie thought. She had to do something otherwise she is going to be transformed into a ball. She hugged Lilith's big toe with all her strength.
Lilith did not feel anything and simply walked on to the door. She greeted Sarah and let her in.
"You are so late" Said Alina laughing. "If you had showed up any later we would have finished all the drinks."
"Oh common, I am sure Rosie would have kept some for me. Speak of, where is Rosie?" Replies Sarah.
Everyone looked around looking for Rosie. She was no where to be seen.
"Maybe she went back? I thought she seemed tired?" Said Lilith. Completely unsuspecting that Rosie was actually hugging her big toe.
"Aww poor Rosie, I was supposed to give a ride home heh. Had to do lots of stuff and completely did not notice the time!"
While the giantesses talked, little Rosie was just trying to survive Lilith's fearsome feet. She had managed to get on top of her big toe, but she was in a tight space between the toes and the roof of the shoes. But she at least could not get crushed here. She could faintly hear sounds from the outside, but it was very sound tight inside here. Barely any light came inside either. On the bright side, it smelled very nice. It was not exactly the best of smells, the air with heavy and filled with Lilith's scent. Her feet felt a bit damp from tiny sweat that no one else but Rosie could feel due to her minuscule size. She continued to hug Lilith's enormous toe with all her strength as the giantess mingled and carried on partying without feeling her.
It was not until sunset when the party started slowing down and people started leaving. The two sisters where aware of Rosie's sudden disappearance but they had a big house to clean, so they would have to call her tomorrow and check up on her. Alina shook her head as she picked up the clothes that someone left. People do crazy things when they are drunk. Lilith busied herself with cleaning the kitchen and doing the dishes. She was still unaware that poor Rosie was struggling between her toes. She still had the beat in the back of her head and was wiggling her toes and tapping her foot while humming.
Rosie was not enjoying this as much as Lilith though. Her plan of getting attention was failing miserably. She simply could not make anyone feel her at her size. Around her Lilith's pretty toes danced up and down. Rosie was being thrown from toe to toe as the foot went up and down. It took her a few minutes and a few bumps to her head to finally cling to Lilith's little toe. This time she had more space for her because this toe was significantly smaller than the first one. For the first time in the past two hours she could catch a breath and look around.
Barely any light made it inside here, but after so many hours her eyes had adjusted to the low light condition. She could see but not too well. She could easily make out the outline's of Lillith's toes, and see the dark shading on all of them. It was obviously newly polished, probably just before the party. After a few minutes Lilith' feet started moving again. This time she was going up the stairs. Rosie has been in this house so many times she knew exactly where every room was, and right now Lilith was heading to her room.
Finally! She thought. Now she might take off her shoes and see me!. Rosie was correct because indeed she heard the tucks on the sneakers unstrap. Light came in as Lilith's foot left the snickers. Rosie was still hanging to the little toe and was expecting to be seen any moment. However immediately after leaving the shoe she was engulfed by another darkness. This time fabric surrounded her from all sides. Thick warm fabric that had the faint smell of Lilith's feet within it.
Lilith had put on her socks so fast she did not really see Rosie hanging on her little toe. Instead Rosie was moved from bad to bad. Lilith loved her stories and as she sat on the bed to read her novel, her feet hung suspended on the other side of the bed. Inside her socks Rosie was just done cursing her luck and started to see what she should do this time. It might be possible for her to crawl out of the socks and then get Lilith's attention.
Unfortunately Lilith still had the music in her head and went back to shaking her feet. The sudden jolt send Rosie flying to the wrong side of Lilith's foot. She found herself hanging to her white smooth sole. It was so pretty, Rosie wished she could just stay here. Her admiration lasted too long though. Lilith moved her foot to rest them on the bed as she sat in a folded legs position. Rosie didn't have time to do anything before she found Lilith's larger than life foot rest above her. Luckily for her the bed under her was soft enough for it to give in to her so she does not get crushed. But she was completely pinned, feeling the full weight of Lilith's foot on her. Tiny drops of sweat covered her whole body. Lilith definitely could no feel her. Rosie tried rubbing or even scratching the sole of Lilith's foot to get her attention but all was to no avail. She was too small. Rosie's naked body now smelled exactly like the Lilith's giant foot. The socks under her smelled like they have not been washed for a while.
Lilith was gently rubbing her foot on the bed. Completely unaware that she was almost torturing Rosie under her feet. Rosie tried her best to crawl away from the massive foot but the subjected weight on her was so great it simply prevented her from moving. She could see the skin stretching in front of her and around her. She was being rolled right and left as Lilith' moved her foot slowly on the bed.
For the first time this evening, Rosie's luck was about to change. Lilith while sitting on the bed pulled the covers on her bottom body and changed her sitting position to cross legged. She reach with her hands inside the covers and pulled the socks away and threw them away. Luckily for Rosie she was stuck to Lilith's smooth skin. But she was for the first time in hour free. It did not take her long to know where she was. It was also a dangerous place to be, she could easily be crushed if Lilith changed her position, but this was her best chance to get her attention, she must make good use of this break.
What will she do?
1411.title: Climb up onto Lilith's TUCKS sneaker and ge...

choices: Alina takes the tiny guy back to her room to play with.
Alina puts the tiny guy in her sandal and puts it back on.
Sarah gets called over and they show her the tiny guy.
1413.content:
Rosie decided to dive for the couch and wait for a safer time to approach her friends when they wern't talking and stumbling around. From her dusty hiding place she watched as Sarah came in and put two cases of beer down by the kitchen entrance and go sit down where Rosie had been. She gulped deeply when Rosie realized she would have been smushed under her friends rear end if she stayed over there on the chair.

Then, something else caught Rosie's attention. A tiny guy was running across the floor! She looked on curiously and realized it looked like the guy who delivered the newspaper on this street. He was around their age, early twenties or so with a thin build and brown hair.

He seemd pretty determined as he ran up to Lilith and Alina. Rosie was quite surprised when Lilith looked down at him and didn't react like he was out of place.

"Oh Alina, there's another one of them. I think it's your turn to take care of this one," Lilith calmly said as she went back to her beer and chatting with Jo.

Meanwhile Alina had turned her attention down to the tiny guy on the floor. He wasn't running away, probably because he expected help, they usually did. She couldn't really reconize him from so high above and she wasn't sure if she really cared. Mostly Lilith and her had been stepping on them barefoot. Her sister Lilith already made videos of her feet online, and Alina saw this as a way to get involved too. No one online would suspect the tiny people were real and she was enjoying it so far. There was something exciting about feeling their tiny bodies squirming under her foot.

Sliding off her sandals Alina put her hands on her hips and looked down at the small figure, "You'd figure you'd leave us alone after everything that's happened. Maybe you want to get stepped on huh? Been eyeing my pretty bare feet little man? I'd love to feel you squish under them, but maybe after I play around with you for a bit first."

Rosie had no idea what was going on now. Was she part of some sort of twisted game her friends were playing? She didn't want to get stepped on. Especially not by her friends, she trusted her friends! Whatever was going on she watched curiously to see exactly what Alina had in mind.

"Okay, run forward and hug my foot if you like them. Otherwise I may just get bored and end up smushing you right here. After all, if you're not interested in playing games and you're running up to us, you must just wanna get stepped on," Alina teased.

To her surprise, Rosie watched as the tiny guy ran foward and hugged one of Alina's toes. She laughed loudly and smiled to Lilith who returned a grin.

"I think we've got a keeper here," Alina explained, "Or at least until I get bored of him."

"Have fun but don't wander off too long, this is your party after all," Lilith told her sister.
1413.title: Look for another party goer or hide for awhile ...

choices: Sarah decides to go for it and stands up, taking off her sandals.
Alina shows Sarah how it's done while she watches at ground level.
14133.content:
Alina grinned down at the tiny guy and looked up, "Hey Sarah! Comon over here for a moment!"

Looking over from the window Sarah tilted her head. She realized she hadn't even wished the birthday girl well or anything. The girl with red streaks in her hair wandered over quickly with a bounce in her step and came to a stop just in front of the tiny guy she didn't even see on the floor. Like most of the other girls she had sandals on that the guy was now almost face to face with after letting go of Alina's toe and settling back down on the floor.

"Hey! Happy Birthday Alina! I'm so sorry I didn't say anything sooner. I just, thought Rosie was supposed to be here by now," Sarah explained giving her friend a big hug.

That gave Alina a moment to pause. Rosie was here. "She was around just a moment ago. I'm sure she'll be back soon. Hey, wanna do me a favour?"

Sarah smiled and looked excited, "Yeah sure Alina, it's your special day after all. What did you have in mind?" She casually brushed her hair back over one ear.

Grinning down towards the ground Alina said, "See that down there? I want you to take off your sandals and put your foot on it."

Looking down curiously Sarah noticed the tiny guy at her feet, "Whoa! What in the world IS that?" She stumbled back away from him. That even caused Lilith to look over for a moment and laugh.

"You havn't heard eh?" Lilith explained, "We've had these tiny people showing up around our place. They look like people in the neibourhood. We've got no way of helping them so we've been treating them like pests."

Meanwhile Sarah was already down on her hands and knees poking at the tiny guy with her massive fingers with dark red nail polish, "You've been stepping on them? But, they're people! Or at least they really look like people."

"There's been way too many," Alina explained, "So much so we've made a game out of this kind of stuff. It's gotten really bad. Otherwise we just don't know what else to do. If we told anyone we'd probably end up kicked out of our house and they'd want to investigate."

Sarah looked up, brushing her hair back again and staring at Alina apologetically, "I suppose so. But it seems so mean what you're doing. Can't feed them all and look after them if there's been that many."

"So what do you say, wanna try stepping on him?" Lilith encouraged down to Sarah.
14133.title: Alina calls Sarah over to see the shrunken guy.

choices: continue
141331.content:
The more Sarah thinks about it, the more she likes the idea of bringing her toes down, ever so slowly, on the poor people; pressing down on their lower half, so that their insides come out their mouths. It was such a nice idea to squish people and have no consequence for it. Sarah was smiling. "Sure!!" Removing her sandals, and airing her stinky feet, she moves them towards the cowering person.

The person became very animated in his movements as he tried to cover his nose.

"Time to meet my toes, little bug!" Sarah brought down her toes.

The person squished easily, leaving behind a bloody mess.

"That was cool! Okay, lets find more!"

15.title: Your Chance

About six inches tall(15 cm), size of a doll
Less than an inch tall, size of a small ant.
151.content:
It’s been a long day at work. You finally make it home and you are about ready to relax and take a long nap when you hear the booming noise from across the street. You look out the window and take notice of all the vehicles that are parked on the house across the street.

“Must be some kind of party”, you mutter aloud.

You really don’t want to seem like some kind of jerk but you are really tired and the noise of death metal and other music at full blast, so loud that it penetrates your house like it’s nothing. You can’t relax like this. You stumble outside your house and make your way across the street, taking notice of the sky full of storm clouds. You are familiar with the owners of the house. Two women from what you know, one in her mid-twenties and the other in her early twenties or late teens. They seem to be what they call, goths as they wear all black and have the other… accessories, that otherwise lead you to believe. You get closer to the house and the music gets louder, you take notice of the grass in the yard being long, the trees seemingly desolated with no green leaves and of course cars still stack the driveway and are lined up along the curve. You soon make it to the front door where you take a deep breath and knock on the door three times….

Nothing. The music must to loud.

This time you bang on the door three times. Suddenly a streak of lightning darts down and strikes you on your back! You instantly feel a burning sensation that spreads instantly along your whole body, you honestly believe you are going to die as the burning gets so hotter and the temperature of your skin just stops right before the point where it would seem to damage the cells. You suddenly notice that everything around you grows bigger and bigger! You are in a panicked state to say the least but you have enough logic to know that the world probably isn’t enlarging, no, you are shrinking! The streak of lightning seems to have an adverse effect on your body, instead of killing you with its millions of volts and temperature of hotter than the surface of the sun, it instead shrinks you until you are…..
151.title: Long Day, About to Get Longer and Larger

choices: One
Two
Four
1512.content:
You wake up the next morning with a piercing headache that quickly recedes. You open your eyes and blink, wondering why everything seems brighter.

You blink again.

This doesn't seem right.

You look around at what appears to be grassland filled with lush, green vegetation that you've never seen. You look up and your brain bluescreens. That looks like a house, but it's bigger than anything you've ever seen.

At this point you're panicking in the same way one panics when one jumps into a pool wrong and suddenly can't breathe. While you're devoting all of your attention on your crumbling worldview, several small earthquakes occur, which you later realize were footsteps.


How many pairs of footsteps are there?
1512.title: A Significant Decrease

choices: Run inside the house, while the door is open.
Find a way to climb the giantess while she is standing still and preoccupied.
1513.content:
You continue to shrink, smaller and smaller until you finally stop at a height well under an inch tall! You look around as the porch you are standing on has expanding miles and miles on either side! The seemingly smooth concrete floor now looks like rough terrain as its details are magnified, lawn chairs make for gigantic structures and the front door ahead of you is outrageously huge. The music from the house is MUCH louder than ever before, so loud that you can’t even hear yourself breathe. You continue to look up at the front door, pinching yourself without looking just to make sure this is all real and of course a small pain on your arm confirms your fears.

As you are about to think on what to do next, suddenly the front door swings open! You crane your head back to look at the figure who opened the it. A young woman perhaps in her early twenties who seemed to be thousands of feet in height, of course she had raven black hair, green eyes with a cold pierce, she wore a silver medallion necklace, a purple tank top that exposed her stomach and black jeans which were tucked into a large pair of black boots. You were frozen as your neck was craned all the way back to see the chin under the monolithic goth’s face. With the door open, the music was louder than ever and seemed to really set the mood for your crazy situation.

The gigantic woman starts looking around, “I could’ve fucking swore I heard someone knock on the door!” escapes a thunderous loud voice from the woman’s lips.

She takes a step forward to get a better view outside. You look up at the giantess’s enormous boot as it lifts high in the air and goes from several hundred feet away in front of you to casting a shadow right above you exposing you to the dirty underside of the deadly footwear! You are luckily on the outer edge of the shadow and you quickly dodge as the boot crashed down at your former position, making a loud BOOM proceeded by the ground shaking violently and causing a gust of wind to literally pick you off of your feet and slide you across the concrete patio floor! This all happened in an instant, contrasting your perception that giants would be moving in slow motion like the cartoons and shows depict, they move VERY fast and cover a wide-range of distance meaning that you aren’t really safe anywhere! You stand up on your feet and brush yourself off, taking in deep breaths with beads of cold sweat dripping down your body. The giantess continues to scan the area as you stand still. You need to find a way to get help as you will not be able to survive outdoors at this size as most bugs can make an easy meal… no snack out of you and it also wouldn’t bode well on your luck to continue to have to dodge a giant’s foot every day. You are going to have to get help from one of these goth girls at this little party they are having.

As the giantess continues to wonder who was at the door, you decide to take the opportunity to….
1513.title: Crash

choices: On the living room table
Inside someone's boot/shoe
15131.content:
You waste no time and sprint as fast as your tiny legs can take you towards the open door as the giantess crosses her arms.

"Must be some little punks playing games at the door... or maybe I am just drinking too much" the giantess mutters to herself as she begins to turn around and walk towards the front door.

In what took over thirty seconds of straight sprinting to get to the entrance way of the door, it takes her only about two to take a couple of steps and be right behind you! You quickly run inside the house and find yourself on the marble floor that marked the front foyer, the music from the house afflicts your ears like sledgehammers and makes your body shake with each beat.

"It was nothing" the giantess says as she walks inside the house.

You look behind yourself as the giantess takes a step inside with her massive boot, you are far enough this time to avoid being blown away or losing balance from the powerful crash of her boot but you are totally unprepared as the goth closes the door behind herself, the wind from the door is much more powerful than any hurricane wind in proportion to your height and you find yourself blown into the sky!

You scream as you twirl around the air, the vision of the gigantic house spinning in circles until you somehow, safely land.....
15131.title: Uninvited

choices: A worn leather doc marten lace up boot
A dirty faded converse sneaker

151312.title: A boot or sneaker?

You are not successful.
1513122.content:
You bounced off a fabric wall and then tumble down onto a damp surface. You have no idea where you just ended up as you get to your feet slowly. As your vision clears, you are barley able to make out a huge faded "Converse" logo on the surface. Thats when you realize that you are inside a shoe!

It smells quite bad. In fact, the insole still feels a little moist so you assume the owner just removed them from their feet not too long ago. Above you, you can see the shoes logo with a "6 womens" stamped on it. Even tho converse sneakers are unisex, theres no way any full grown man wears a size 6 shoe. So these obviously have to belong to a female. Its quite dark, but as you look around your surroundings, you can tell that these shoes are pretty worn in. Of course, now isnt the time to inspect the condition of this environment anymore. You need to find a way out of this shoe. You notice the fabric on the heel area is torn and frayed. You could use that to climb out! Just as you advance torwards it, a sudden earthquake knocks you off your feet!

"What the??!" You say to yourself. Just then, you hear a voice right above you looked up. You have no idea who she is, but you hear her addressed as "Arden". Arden is a petite goth asian girl with black hair put up in ponytails and wearing a pink dress with black animal printings on it. She is obviously the owner of these sneakers as she is preparing to insert her nylon clad feet into them! Normally, Arden only wore a size 5/6 US womens shoe but now at your current stature her foot alone is about as large as a cruise ship! You heard something about more beer being out in somebody's car and that they want Arden to get it. You watch as Arden's nyloned toes begin to lower into the sneaker and thats when you realize you need to find a safe spot somewhere in the shoe to avoid being crushed! Quickly looking around,
1513122.title: Ardens Chuck Taylors

choices: You continue to climb the shoe, praying she doesn't move.
The giantess notices her boot lace is untied.
15132.content:
You finally managed to break the spell, recovering from your awe-induced immobilization. The sheer gigantic proportions of everything around you had left you helplessly enthralled against your better judgment. The thunderous boom of the goth girl's foot fall had shocked you back into sense, however, and now your mind was now in full gear, desperately trying to reason and make a plan to survive this encounter with enormity. You were lucky enough to dodge one of those lethal steps, but there was no telling whether or not that fortuity was tenable. No, you needed to get some help. Hopefully you had friends in high places.

From the worm's eye view that you had at the moment, the best you could do was crane your neck as far as it would allow. The ginormous goth was looking outside, and her body had gone almost completely still. That's when the light bulb went off. If you took off for it now, you could get yourself a relatively safe position on top of the boot. Then from there you could coordinate a plan for getting her attention soon after. It would be a good way to get yourself killed if the plan backfired, but with your options so limited, it was really all you could do. Her next step could easily crush you anyway. There was really no escaping her range.

Taking a deep breath, you started to make a run for the towering edifice that was the goth woman's footwear. The closer you got to it, the more insane your plan began to feel, but you were set on it. If you stayed where you were, you'd certainly die, and trying to take off and hide would only result in the same end. You made incredible time, crossing the expanse in just about a minute. Panting slightly, you humorously think that shrinking had been the best thing to happen to your health in some time. You took hold of one the bumpy side of the leather boot closest to you and secured your footing. Here went nothing.
15132.title: A Desperate Gamble
